text: Kangujam is a Meitei family. It is native to Ancient Kangleipak (Antique Manipur). People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India. == Notable persons == * Chinglensana Kangujam — Indian field hockey player who plays as a halfback, for "Dabang Mumbai" in the Hockey India League. * Licypriya Kangujam — Indian child environmental activist from Manipur, India. == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/similar- surname.aspx?surname=Kangujam * http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/similarfamilyname.aspx?surname=Kangujam Category:Meitei surnames
title: Kangujam
